blantyreSepsis 1.0.0.0000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Aetiology and determinants of outcome in sepsis in an urban african centre: an observational cohort study

BTparticipants

BTparticipants.Rd

225 adults with sepsis in Blantyre, Malawi

BTparticipants

Format

A data frame with 225 rows and 22 variables:

pid

Study identifier

calc_age

Age in years at enrollment

ptsex

Gender one of (male,female)

hivstatus

HIV status one of (Non reactive, Reactive)

cd4_absolute

CD4 cell count in cells per microlitre

hivonart

For HIV infected participants, whether currently taking antiretroviral therapy. One of (Yes, No)

art_time

Number of months on antiretroviral therapy

hivcpt

For HIV infected participants, whether currently taking co-trimoxazole preventative therapy. One of (Yes, No)

ever_tb

Ever been treated for TB? One of (Yes, No)

tbongoing

Currently being treated for TB? One of (Yes, No)

screentemp

Temperature in degrees celsius at recruitment

t0hr

Heart rate in beats per minute at recruitment

t0sbp

Systolic blood pressure at recruitment in mmHg

t0dbp

Diastolic blood pressure at recruitment in mmHg

gcs

Glasgow coma score at recruitment

ustand

Unable to stand at recruitment

days_unwell

Length of current illness in days

haemoglobin

Haemoglobin in g/dL at recrutment

platelets

Platelet count in cells x 10^9/L at recruitment

wcc

White cell count in cells x 10^9/L at recruitment

sodium

Serum sodium in mmol/L at recruitment

potassium

Serum potassium in mmol/L at recruitment

co2

Serum bicarbonate in mmol/L at recruitment

urea

Serum urea in mmol/L at recruitment

creatinine

Serum creatinine in mmol/L at recruitment

lactate

Serum lactate in mmol/L at recruitment

urea

Serum urea in mmol/L at recruitment

dxx_death

Death by xx days, 1 = died, 0 = survived

t

Follow up time in days

died

Did participant die (1) or was alive (0) at the end of follow up time

Details

Demographics, vitals, investigations, and outcome for 225 adults with sepsis in Blantrye, Malawi. Missing data given by NA in all cases.
